message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.MM 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the recovery of sparse signals from compressed linear measurements using $\ell_1$ minimization and analyzes the tradeoff between sparsity and recovery stability. This falls under the topics of information theory (cs.IT), signal processing (cs.SP), and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also uses mathematical analysis and optimization techniques, which are relevant to numerical analysis (cs.NA) and mathematical modeling (cs.MM).
